Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Infinite Ang: Sustaining damage over time and damage taken from attacks is increased.
Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Leaden_Desc: Movement speed is reduced, and cannot be restored by normal means.
Bosse_Zurvan_Attack_鬼神：履行技スタート：演出アクション：ノ: 鬼神：履行技スタート：演出アクション：ノーマル
Bosse_Zurvan_Status_Deep Freeze_Desc: Your body is encased in ice, preventing action and dealing damage over time.
Bosse_Zurvan_Status_Down For The Count_D: Unable to move or execute actions.
ContentDesc_Götterdämmerung - Zurvan:
Only one pillar of the Warring Triad remains: Zurvan, the Demon. Worshipped by a Meracydian race of centaur-like beings, this eikon manifested upon the physical plane as an embodiment of eternal victory. And yet, despite his godlike might, Zurvan was captured. He has languished in his Allagan-made prison now for five thousand years, his primal desire for justice swelling in magnitude with each passing millennium...

Through an unlikely alliance with the VIth Imperial Legion, you and your companions were able to prevent a catastrophic awakening orchestrated by the Demon's thralls. But your work is not yet finished. Honor the sacrifice of Regula van Hydrus, and remove the threat of Zurvan from this world once and for all!
Instancecontenttextdata_14300_Text: Initiating final disengagement sequence.All non-combat personnel are advised to evacuate.
Instancecontenttextdata_14301_Text: Mine age of slumber is at an end.
Instancecontenttextdata_14302_Text: A thousand thousand suns may set...
Instancecontenttextdata_14303_Text: But the insult of mine imprisonment...
Instancecontenttextdata_14304_Text: Hath been etched upon mine eternal memory.
Instancecontenttextdata_14305_Text: I am come to mete out justice.
Instancecontenttextdata_14306_Text: To bestow the blessings of victory unending.
Instancecontenttextdata_14308_Text: He who standeth above all other gods.
Instancecontenttextdata_14309_Text: He who shall bring slaughter and ruin!
Instancecontenttextdata_14310_Text: Disengagement sequence complete.Subject: Zurvan is released from containment.
Instancecontenttextdata_14311_Text: Good and evil, the war eternal...
Instancecontenttextdata_14312_Text: The fires of anger roar and howl...
Instancecontenttextdata_14315_Text: By sorrow's chill doth all become ice...
Instancecontenttextdata_14320_Text: Frozen in time, mine armor of flame.Unto eternity's end, my righteous reign!
Instancecontenttextdata_14322_Text: What manner of mortals withstand such punishment?By battle, then, shall your fate be decided!
Instancecontenttextdata_14324_Text: Graven in flesh, the brand is awoken...Suffer in endless torment!
